text: Natalie Minardi Slater is an American television soap opera writer. She was originally groomed by Kay Alden to be her successor on Y&R; when she stepped down as Head Writer. ==Positions held== The Young and the Restless *Associate Head Writer (2005–2012) *Breakdown Writer (1998 - November 2004, May 6, 2013 - present) *Script Editor (1998 - November 2004) *Production Staff (1991–1997) ==Awards and nominations== Daytime Emmy Award *Nominations, 1999–2001, 2003, 2004–2006, 2008, Best Writing, The Young And The Restless *Wins, 2000 and 2006, Best Writing, The Young And The Restless Writers Guild of America Award *Nominations, 1999, 2001–2002, 2005-2006 seasons, The Young And The Restless *Wins, 2002 and 2005 seasons, The Young And The Restless ==External links== * Category:American soap opera writers Category:Daytime Emmy Award winners Category:Writers Guild of America Award winners Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Soap opera producers Category:American television producers Category:American women television producers Category:American women television writers Category:American women writers Category:Women soap opera writers
title: Natalie Minardi Slater
